summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a suburban road with light traffic. The road is clear with a few parked cars on the right side. The vehicle maintains a steady speed and lane position throughout the segment.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and lane position. There are no sudden changes in speed or direction, indicating a calm driving environment.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A black car, approximately 10 meters away, parked and not posing any immediate threat. 2) Right side: A white car, approximately 15 meters away, parked and not posing any immediate threat.
